column1: We love our dogs. They love to race.
EXPRESS EMPORIUM (1) - checked outwards off heels in the run to the bend colliding with BIGTIME JETTY. Coursed wide through the run home.
BIGTIME JETTY (3) - began awkwardly. Contacted from the inside by EXPRESS EMPORIUM in the run to the bend.
LOOKING SNATCHED (5) - squeezed for racing room entering the bend losing ground.
LAST STAR (7) - hampered early stages. Squeezed for racing room entering the bend. Coursed wide rounding the bend and through the run home.
SUSPICIOUS MINDS (8) - shifted down the track on jumping hampering LAST STAR.

column5: Owned/Raced by: D Lane & J Arthur

column1: REACT RESPOND (2) - awkwardly placed on heels entering the final bend.
TALKABOUT SOPHIE (6) - contacted from the outside by JINJA JAKE on jumping before being obligated to check of the heels of OPAWA BIG. Bumped with JINJA JAKE rounding the first bend.
JINJA JAKE (9/7) - bumped with TALKABOUT SOPHIE on jumping. Bumped with TALKABOUT SOPHIE rounding the first bend.
CHARLOW (2) - bumped with SIMPLY SMOOTH on jumping. Checked off heels rounding the first bend losing ground.
BIG TIME MAPLE (6) - checked from behind exiting the final bend.
MELITA VELLA (7) - awkwardly placed on heels exiting the final bend.
GRUNT (8) - checked from behind rounding the first bend.
SPRING QUEEN (9/1) - awkwardly placed on heels first bend,
SIMPLY SMOOTH (10/3) - bumped with CHARLOW on jumping.

column3: Jo's Wholesale & Sports Bar Taipa Tavern Sprint

column1: KAPAI STEWIE (1) - contacted from the outside by PLATINUM SPIRIT in the run to the bend. Had to check when squeezed for racing room rounding the bend. Shouldered with PLATINUM SPIRIT through the later stages of the run home.
BOTANY RIFLES (2) - jostled with PADDY FAST prior to the bend.

PLATINUM SPIRIT (3) - bumped with PADDY FAST early stages before contacting KAPAI STEWIE in the run to the bend. Checked from behind exiting the bend. Shouldered with KAPAI STEWIE through the later stages of the run home.
PADDY FAST (4) - squeezed for racing room early stages. Jostled with BOTANY RIFLES prior to the bend.
MY SNUGGLES (5) - clipped heels rounding the bend.

column5: Owned/Raced by: I Pave Shirley Boys Syndicate

column1: MIGHTY MUSCLE (2) - slow early. squeezed for racing room first turn having to check off heels losing ground.
ALENG (5) - checked off heels first bend and again third turn.

column5: Owned/Raced by: Eddie Mathews & Steve Clark

column1: BOTANY THOMMO (1) - slow early. Lost momentum when awkwardly placed on heels entering the bend.
NOISE MAKER (2) - bumped with GAIN CAPITAL exiting the bend.
PLISKOVA (3) - collided with BIGTIME LOVIE early stages.
BIGTIME LOVIE (4) - contacted from the inside by PLISKOVA early stages before being placed in restricted room losing ground.
GREY WAY (5) - squeezed for racing room early stages.
GAIN CAPITAL (7) - bumped with NOISE MAKER exiting the bend.

column7: Trained by: J Udy & D Cottam

column1: BIG TIME CHANCE (2) - bumped with BIGTIME BREMNER early stages.
BIGTIME BREMNER (3) - bumped with BIG TIME CHANCE early stages. Awkwardly positioned on heels entering the bend.
OAKMONT (6) - awkwardly placed to the hind quarters of JINJA MONGO prior to the bend losing momentum.
JINJA MONGO (7) - hind quarters bumped by OAKMONT prior to the bend.
ASHEN (8) - coursed wide exiting the bend and throughout the run home.

column7: Trained by: J Udy & D Cottam

column1: JINJA MURPHY (1) - bumped with JINJA BABE early stages.
SEFTON STAN (2) - squeezed for racing room early stages.
JINJA BABE (3) - bumped with JINJA MURPHY early stages.
OPAWA DELIGHT (6) - clipped the heels of GO ANGEL entering the first bend falling to the track. Referred to the Veterinarian where it was reported to have pain to its right quadricep.
PAM ARISING (8) - terminally checked entering the first bend by the falling OPAWA DELIGHT. Referred to the Veterinarian and cleared of injury.

column5: Owned/Raced by: Ferguson, O'Neill, Northcott, Hardaker & Three Logans Syndicate

column1: ROBSON (2) - jostled with BIG TIME IZZY through the back straight before being hampered entering the final bend.
OSTER BALE (5) - checked outwards off heels early stages.
BIGTIME ROD (6) - placed in tight quarters entering the final bend falling to the track as a consequence. Referred to the Veterinarian and cleared of injury.
BIG TIME IZZY (9/4) - jostled with ROBSON through the back straight. Hampered and lost ground entering the final bend.
NOVA WILLOW (2) - bumped with KAI NAN prior to the first bend.
ZIPPING MONTY (3) - placed in tight quarters rounding the first bend having to check.
KAI NAN (5) - placed in tight quarters entering the first bend after bumping with NOVA WILLOW.
OPAWA LOLA (8) - checked and lost ground entering the final bend.

column3: Qualified Pet Services Railway Sprint FinalGroup 1

column7: Trained by: J Udy & D Cottam

column1: SELECT TRICK (4) - placed in tight quarters entering the bend being obligated to check off heels and lose ground. Referred to the Veterinarian where it was reported to be lame in its right hip support.
ARCHIE JOHN HILL (5) - bumped with TROJAN HOARSE in the run to the bend.
TROJAN HOARSE (6) - hampered early stages before coming together with ARCHIE JOHN HILL. Placed on heels prior to the bend.
SUPER OVER DRAMA (7) - squeezed for room early stages.
BUDDY BOOM (8) - shifted down the track early stages impeding inside greyhounds.
JINJA BAILEY (2) - jostled with HANDS OF STEEL in the run to the bend. Shouldered with FLYING HUEY prior to the bend losng ground.
HANDS OF STEEL (3) - squeezed for racing room in the run to the bend losing ground.
KURIDRANI (4) - jostled with HANDS OF STEEL in the run to the bend.
FLYING HUEY (5) - shouldered with JINJA BAILEY prior to the bend losing ground.
